attributes.action: Stop all nuclear weapons from being manufactured, bought and sold.
attributes.additional_details: War is the act of devolved minds. It is the act of cowards and those who hold avarice above life. Wars created for corporate and personal greed has no place in humanity's present or future. It is an act of sub-human stupidity and weak and highly corrupt leadership. If we are to advance as a civilisation into a truly peaceful, unified world of equality and quality of life for all then all wars must end and end now.
attributes.background: To end the buying, selling and manufacturing of all nuclear weapons and missiles and to deactivate all active nuclear warheads of which the UK currently has 225 nuclear warheads.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Dispose of the UK's Nuclear Warheads and encourage other nations to do the same
